# Exploring Metadata
### Overview of Exploratory Data Analysis 
This chapter introduces exploratory data analysis (summary, tables, time series, plots, comparisons) while also providing an introduction to metadata types and their function for interdisciplinary data mining.

### Documents
- Titles
- Authors
### Demographics
- Names
- Profiles
### Locations
- City, State, Country
- Geolocation
- IP Address
- Document/page metadata
- User metadata
